text.config.clans.title: Clans Config
text.config.clans.suffix.economy: This requires Grand Economy to be installed.
text.config.clans.suffix.formula: See the wiki for formula writing details.
text.config.clans.clan.desc: Config values related to clans, which cannot be overridden on a per-clan basis.
text.config.clans.clan.multiClanMembersh: Allow players to be a member of multiple clans at once.
text.config.clans.clan.defaultClan.desc: Default clan to put players in when they first join the server. Leave empty for no clan.
text.config.clans.clan.formClanBankAmoun: Initial amount in a clan account's balance when it is formed.
text.config.clans.clan.maxNameLength.des: Maximum clan name length. Larger values allow more characters,
but also increase the chance of clans making their name hard to
type in an attempt to avoid getting raided. Set to 0 for no limit.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.desc: Config values related to clans, which can be overridden on a per-clan basis.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.prefix.des: Clan prefix for chat. If the player is in multiple clans,
it displays their default clan. Set to empty for no prefix.
\%s is where the clan name will go.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.multipleLe: Allow clans to have multiple leaders at once.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.homeWarmup: The amount of time, in seconds, the player must wait after typing /clan home before being teleported.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.homeCooldo: The amount of time, in seconds, the player must wait after
teleporting to the clan home before they can use /clan home again.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.maxClaimCo: Max claims per clan. Set to a negative number for infinite.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.homeFallba: Allow players to spawn at the clan home if they don't have a bed.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.upkeepFreq: How often to charge clans upkeep, in days. Set to 0 to disable upkeep.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.disbandWhe: Disband the clan when it can't afford upkeep.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.leadersCan: Allow the clan leader to withdraw funds from the clan bank account.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.leadersRec: When enabled, remaining clan funds go to the clan leader when the clan is disbanded.
When disabled, remaining clan funds get split evenly among all clan members when the clan is disbanded.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.rentFreque: Frequency to charge clan members rent to go into the clan bank account, in days.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.kickWhenUn: Kick clan members out who can't afford rent. This will not kick out leaders.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.kickAdmins: Kick admins when out of rent
Kick clan admins out who can't afford rent. This will not kick out leaders.
text.config.clans.clanDefault.maxRent.de: Maximum amount of rent a clan can charge. Set to 0 for no maximum.
text.config.clans.raid.maxRaiders.desc: Maximum raider count for a raiding party.
text.config.clans.raid.maxRaidDuration.d: Maximum duration a raid can last for, in seconds. If set to 0, raids will be disabled.
text.config.clans.raid.preparationTime.d: The amount of time the defenders are given to prepare before raiders can attack, in seconds.
Amount of time before the end of the raid to make all defenders glow, in seconds.
text.config.clans.raid.maxAttackerAbando: Maximum amount of consecutive time a raiding player can remain outside their target's territory, in seconds.
text.config.clans.raid.maxDefenderDesert: Maximum amount of consecutive time a defending player can remain outside their clan's territory, in seconds.
text.config.clans.raid.shieldAfterRaid.d: Amount of shield given to the defending clan after a raid, in hours.
text.config.clans.raid.initialShield.des: Amount of shield given to a newly formed clan, in hours.
text.config.clans.raid.preventReclaiming: Prevents reclaiming TNT that was placed while raiding.
text.config.clans.raid.breakSpeedMultipl: Multiplies the breaking speed of blocks by this amount when raiding.
text.config.clans.raid.enableRaidRollbac: Rolls back the raided clan's land to its previous state when a raid ends.
text.config.clans.raid.enableStealing.de: Controls if stealing from containers (even locked ones) is allowed during raids.
Theft from containers does not get rolled back at the end of the raid.
text.config.clans.raid.itemList.desc[0]: A list of items to be allowed/blocked in a raid.
text.config.clans.raid.itemList.desc[1]: If it contains a *, this is a list of blocked items.
text.config.clans.raid.itemList.desc[2]: If not, this is a list of allowed items.
text.config.clans.raid.teleportOnRaidSta: Teleports raiders outside the target clan's home territory when the raid starts.
text.config.clans.raid.raidStartCost.des: The cost of starting a raid.
